name: Unidentified_Zygerrian_slaver_3
content:
Around 21 BBY, this Zygerrian was working as a slaver in the Labor Processing Hub on Kadavo.
This Zygerrian slaver worked in the Labor Processing Hub during the time when High Jedi General Obi-Wan Kenobi, Captain Rex, Togruta colonists of Kiros, and their leader Roshti were imprisoned there. This slaver helped another one when Obi-Wan dared to talk back to that one for punishing Roshi instead of himself, telling him that he doesn't get commands from a slave. This slaver used a rod to electrocute Obi-Wan by using his collar until Obi-Wan fell to the ground and asked for forgiveness from the other slaver.
